ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You always have a knack for saying what I try to say, only in a nicer way. ... Nope, hence my bard since beta3 *SHRUG* comment in response. Like it means
ygData.messageBody:
>and no there is no right or wrong to farming, but the people who first got
>this armor, who learned the zones, who died and died and died, are the ones
>who will argue that it is important to earn the armor. farming is
>offensive
>to us, and we view people who do it as cheap. like i said, right or wrong,
>that's how we feel is all.
>
>Shada


You always have a knack for saying what I try to say, only in a nicer way.


>p.s. am i the only one who hears "i know more than you" whenever you read
>"bard of norrath since beta 2?"

Nope, hence my "bard since beta3 *SHRUG*" comment in response. Like it means
anything.

BTW, we finally took Hoshkar down yesterday, it was a crazy battle. Big
mucho congrats to Afterlife on doing the same last week!

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
55th Bard of Veeshan
